name: Little Soul (GreenBoxGames)
description:
This game is best played in FULLSCREEN mode.

My entry to the Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3! A bullet hell game where Less Hp = More Damage! (The lower your health, the more damage you do!) You play as the little soul who explores a dangerous world looking for the 3 keys to unlock the gate to a better place. 

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Hold and Release Left Click to fire your beam

Hold Right Click to Regenerate Energy

Aim with the mouse

If the HTML5 version is too laggy try the Windows Version down below!
